name: 王多柏
objective: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
schedule:
1: Introduction to wireless communication from the aspects of system (one week)
2: Basic Concepts in RF Design (one week)
3: Matching Network (one week)
4: Low-Noise Amplifiers (one week)
5: Simulation with Spectre RF: LNA (two weeks)
6: Mixers (one week)
7: Simulation with Spectre RF: Mixer (two weeks)
8: Voltage-Controlled Oscillators (one week)
9: Simulation with Spectre RF: VCO (two weeks)
10: Power Amplifier (one week)
11: Simulation with Advanced Design System (ADS): PA (two weeks)
12: Antenna (one week)
13: Simulation with HFSS: Antenna (two weeks)
materials:
RF Microelectronics, Prentice-Hall, second edition, 2012. Behzad Razavi.
RF Microelectronics, Prentice-Hall, 1998. Behzad Razavi.
Microwave Transistor Amplifiers: Analysis and Design, 2/E, 2008
天線設計-HFSS模擬應用 全華圖書 陳華明編著 2010
